text: {| |} MV Stephanie Marie is a passenger ferry owned and operated by Aleson Shipping Lines. She's the former MV Marima III and currently acquired by Aleson Shipping since 1998. MV Stephanie Marie is also dubbed as MV Stephanie Marie 1 following the acquisition of MV Stephanie Marie 2 == References == Category:1979 ships Category:Ships built in Japan Category:Ferries of the Philippines Category:Active ships of the Philippines
title: MV Stephanie Marie
